languages.text: Церковь святого Друза продолжала упорную борьбу, распространяя веру по Простору и обличая власть предержащих в грехах. Чем сильнее и богаче была планета, тем меньше ее владыки желали видеть укутанных в черное проповедников. Погромы и убийства вытесняли церковь туда, где она чувствовала себя увереннее всего — на фронтир.

The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.
languages.original_text: Церковь святого Друза продолжала упорную борьбу, распространяя веру по Простору и обличая власть предержащих в грехах. Чем сильнее и богаче была планета, тем меньше ее владыки желали видеть укутанных в черное проповедников. Погромы и убийства вытесняли церковь туда, где она чувствовала себя увереннее всего — на фронтир.

traits.locale_text: Saint Drusus Church continued its persistent struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile sins of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier the planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the Church to one place where it was most confident — the frontier.

The stronger and wealthier the planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the Church to one place where it was most confident — the frontier.

Riots and assassinations pushed the Church to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the Church to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. languages.text: 圣德鲁苏斯教会继续坚持不懈地进行斗争，在科罗努斯扩区传播信仰，揭露当权者的邪恶罪行。越是强大、富有的行星，它的统治者就越是不愿意看到这些穿着黑衣的布道士。由于不断爆发暴乱与暗杀行为，圣德鲁苏斯教会最终被逼到了它最能彰显力量的地方，即扩区的边缘星系。
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: 圣德鲁苏斯教会继续坚持不懈地进行斗争，在科罗努斯扩区传播信仰，揭露当权者的邪恶罪行。越是强大、富有的行星，它的统治者就越是不愿意看到这些穿着黑衣的布道士。由于不断爆发暴乱与暗杀行为，圣德鲁苏斯教会最终被逼到了它最能彰显力量的地方，即扩区的边缘星系。

languages.text: Der Kult des Heiligen Drusus setzte seine unermüdlichen Bemühungen fort, den Glauben in der Ausdehnung zu verbreiten und die schändlichen Sünden der Behörden aufzudecken. Je stärker und wohlhabender ein Planet war, desto weniger wollten die Herrscher die schwarzgekleideten Prediger sehen. Aufstände und Attentate drängten den Kult an den Ort, an dem er sich am sichersten fühlte — in das Grenzgebiet.
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: Die Kirche des Heiligen Drusus setzte ihre beständigen Bemühungen fort, den Glauben in der Ausdehnung zu verbreiten und die schändlichen Sünden der Behörden aufzudecken. Je stärker und wohlhabender ein Planet war, desto weniger wollten die Herrscher die schwarzgekleideten Prediger sehen. Aufstände und Attentate drängten die Kirche an den Ort, an dem sie sich am sichersten fühlte — in das Grenzgebiet.

languages.text: Le Culte de Saint Drusus continua sa lutte obstinée pour répandre la foi dans les Étendues et exposer les méfaits des autorités. Plus une planète était riche et puissante, moins ses dirigeants se montraient accueillants envers les prêcheurs vêtus de noir. Les émeutes et les assassinats poussèrent le Culte là où il se sentait le plus confiant : la frontière.
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: L’Église de Saint Drusus continua sa lutte obstinée pour répandre la foi dans les Étendues et exposer les méfaits des autorités. Plus une planète était riche et puissante, moins ses dirigeants se montraient accueillants envers les prédicateurs vêtus de noir. Les émeutes et les assassinats poussèrent l'Église là où elle se sentait la plus confiante : la frontière.

languages.text: El Culto de San Drusus continuó su lucha incansable para expandir su fe por toda la Extensión y revelar las viles infracciones de las autoridades. Cuanto más poderoso y rico era un planeta, menos aprecio sentían sus gobernantes por los predicadores de negro. Las revueltas y los asesinatos empujaron al culto al lugar en el que se sentía más cómoda: la frontera.
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: La Iglesia de San Drusus continuó su lucha insistente para expandir su fe por toda la Extensión y revelar las viles infracciones de las autoridades. Cuanto más poderoso y rico era un planeta, menos aprecio sentían sus gobernantes por los predicadores de negro. Las revueltas y los asesinatos empujaron a la Iglesia al lugar en el que se sentía más cómoda: la frontera.

languages.text: 聖ドルスス教団は、休むことなくエクスパンス全域へと信仰を広め、当局の卑劣な罪を暴くために、絶え間ない闘争を続けていた。その惑星が、より強く、より裕福であればあるほど、その支配者たちは黒衣のプリーチャーには会いたがらなかった。暴動や暗殺により、教団を最も信頼のおける場所…辺境へと押いやった。
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: 聖ドルスス教団は、休むことなくエクスパンス全域へと信仰を広め、当局の卑劣な罪を暴くために、絶え間ない闘争を続けていた。その惑星が、より強く、より裕福であればあるほど、その支配者たちは黒衣のプリーチャーには会いたがらなかった。暴動や暗殺により、教団を最も信頼のおける場所…辺境へと押いやった。

languages.text: Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, inancını Enginlik'e yayma ve yetkililerin adi suçlarını ortaya çıkarma mücadelesine amansızca devam etti. Bir gezegen ne kadar güçlü ve zenginse hükümdarları, karalara bürünmüş vaizleri görmeyi o kadar az istiyordu. İsyanlar ve suikastlar, tarikatı kendine en çok güvendiği yer olan sınır bölgelerine sürükledi.
languages.original_text: The Cult of Saint Drusus continued its indefatigable struggle to spread the faith around the Expanse and expose the vile transgressions of the authorities. The stronger and wealthier a planet was, the less its rulers wanted to see the black-clad preachers. Riots and assassinations pushed the cult to the place where it felt most confident — the frontier.

traits.locale_text: Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, inancını Enginlik'e yayma ve yetkililerin adi suçlarını ortaya çıkarma mücadelesine yorulmak nedir bilmeden devam etti. Bir gezegen ne kadar güçlü ve zenginse, hükümdarları, karalara bürünmüş vaizleri görmeyi o kadar az istiyordu. İsyanlar ve suikastlar, tarikatı kendine en çok güvendiği pozisyona sürükledi: Muharebelerin ön cephesine.
